title: ISic001072. I.Sicily inscription 001072
body:
Facsimile Images

[πρ]ὸ ὀκτὼ καλανδῶν
Ἰ͡εναρίων ἡμ̣[έρ]ᾳ Σε[λ]
ήνης ἐτελεύτησεν
Εὐάγριος ἐτῶν ἴκοσι´ ἡμε[ρῶν ---]

Apparatus criticus

Text after Kaibel, compared against Paci; ΚΑΛΑΝΔΕΙΝBergk, ap. Kaibel from the stone
2: [Φ]ε[βρ]αρίωνPaci
3: ΗΛ...ΑBergk, ap. Kaibel, from the stone, for ἡμ[έρ]α
4: ϹΥΝΛΡΙΟϹΜΑΛΙΚΟϹΙΗΜΕBergk, ap. Kaibel from the stone; reading here is that proposed by Kirchhoff (Kaibel "vix vera sunt"), followed by Paci

translation

commentary

The text is preserved only in a manuscript tradition, and readings, particularly of the final line, depend upon conjectural interpretation of the letters originally recorded by Schubart.

bibliography

  • 14.0252 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001072
  • 54.0928 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796
  • 4.9523 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001252
  • Bergk 1843 675 no. V https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002465
  • Paci 2005 no.8 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001688
